summary: Thieves fall out when over a half million dollars goes missing after the daring and carefully planned robbery of the Los Angeles Coliseum during a football game, each one accusing the other of having the money.
cast: Jim Brown|Diahann Carroll|Ernest Borgnine|Julie Harris|Gene Hackman|Jack Klugman|Warren Oates|James Whitmore|Donald Sutherland|Joyce Jameson|Harry Hickox|Jackie Joseph|Warren Vanders|Priscilla Ann|Thordis Brandt|Calvin Brown|Antony Carbone|Dee Carroll|George Cisar|Bill Couch|Howard Curtis|Fabian Dean|Edith Evanson|Robert Foulk|Roman Gabriel|Jose Gallegos|Chance Gentry|Duane Grey|Chuck Hicks|Jonathan Hole|Kenner G. Kemp|Jon Kowal|Cherie Lamour|Vanessa Lee|Ron McCavour|Tina Menard|Karen Norris|John Orchard|Roger Owens|Geneva Pacheco|Regis Parton|Beverly Powers|Anne Randall|George Robotham|Barry Russo|Carl Saxe|Orriel Smith|Bart Starr|Ron Stokes|Lou Whitehill
title: El reparto
